reasoning.selected_because: Tessellation pattern on a real floor cannot be represented as simple geometry
reasoning.content_analysis: Student needs to see how hexagonal tiles tessellate in a real bathroom setting
reasoning.decision_rule_applied: Rule 9: LAST RESORT - visual pattern recognition where geometry insufficient
reasoning.alternatives_rejected: MATPLOTLIB could draw abstract hexagons but misses the spatial intuition goal
reasoning.summary: Photorealistic tessellation helps students recognize patterns in real-world contexts

classifications.visualization_focus: Bathroom floor with hexagonal tiles showing how they fit together without gaps

diagram_specs.educational_purpose: Help students recognize tessellation patterns in everyday contexts

_fixture_metadata.description: Tessellation pattern recognition - valid IMAGE_GENERATION use case
common_issues_to_check: Prompt must be at least 10 characters
Should NOT include mathematical notation in image
Focus on pattern recognition, not mathematical structure
